website_summaries.verdict: Customers seeking supreme temperature control will appreciate this high-quality travel mug.
pros: Comes in a variety of colors
Retains liquid heat for five hours and cold for nine hours
Leak-free lid built with an interior tea bag holder
cons: Lid can be a little difficult to clean
Branding stickers troublesome to take off product

customer_reviews.title: I believe I got a factory reject
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one at Wal-mart several years ago which I absolutely loved. I decided to buy a new one (not that the old one needed to be replaced). When I use this travel mug, the top does not screw on to the mug to where the drink opening lines up properly with the handle. In order to drink from this mug, I cannot hold the mug by the handle since it does not line up properly. If I buy another one, I will go back to Wal-mart and make sure that it lines up properly before purchasing it. I guess the seller got these at a discount as they were definitely factory seconds or rejects.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent 1

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing .
customer_reviews.text: Keeps beverages hot or cold and easy to use. But after one month the lid broke. Not an issue of seal not fitting or grommet needing tightening, it no longer seals nor will it open all the way, so useless with the lid. Contacted Thermos customer service and they offered to sell me a new lid. I emailed back and asked about the life-time warranty Thermos claims, but did not get a response back.
customer_reviews.author: David Hatcher

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I researched travel mugs to use for taking coffee daily to work. I purchased the item back in January of this year, but did not start using it until about 3 weeks ago. Much to my dismay, I found that the top leaked a lot. However, I kept using it because of the navy blue color and it did keep my coffee fairly hot. When rinsing the cup/top out the other day, the rubber gasket (which was pretty disgustingly dirty) popped out and I cannot get it to go back in so that it somewhat seals the top. I am unfortunately way past the return item date, so now just have a useless travel mug. Thermos should redesign the top....
customer_reviews.author: Terry J. Oakley

customer_reviews.title: Keeps stuff warm but sticker residue cannot be removed
customer_reviews.text: This mug keeps stuff warm but for some stupid reason they attached a paper band to the painted portion of the mug. it has a lot of sticky residue holding it on. No matter how many times its washed, goo-gone, nail polish remove or rubbing alcohol is used it cannot be removed. Why would they ruin the finish of the mug with all this sticky glue that is impossible to get off? Really not well though out. As a result this sticky stuff is still covering part of the mug and looks like crap.
customer_reviews.author: jray

customer_reviews.title: Hard to open
customer_reviews.text: This mug definitely keeps hot liquids hot and cold liquids old for a loooong time! It looks good, fits in the car, and the handle makes it easy to carry and use. BUT, the lid is a royal b#$@h to open!! If you have a weak grip, or even the least bit slippery hand, it will be very difficult to open. Thermos need some kind of rubberized grip around the lid, or it needs some 'corrugation' to grasp.
customer_reviews.author: James D. Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Not for those with arthritis or hand problems
customer_reviews.text: When I cleaned the lid the whole thing popped apart, not just the three pieces that a supposed to come off. I fiddled with it for ages trying to get it together. Finally one last try and it all went into place. Now it will reside on an out of the way top shelf until I rehome it. I don’t consider this item to be Senior friendly. It is too difficult to open. Cleaning and reassembly is just too time consuming and awkward.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Drink Opening is Misaligned
customer_reviews.text: Very solid construction and has the ability to keep liquids hot nearly all day with the lid closed. My biggest complaint is the opening isn't aligned where it should be. Instead of being aligned to the left and right of the handle, it's towards the front and the handle itself. This means its impossible to sip from one end since the handle is in the way and the other end makes it awkward to hold since you can't use the handle. I'm not sure if it's just a design flaw on my model or all of them, but it definitely seems like a miss.
customer_reviews.author: G. Martin

customer_reviews.title: This began to leak because of the broken part  of the lid inside.
customer_reviews.text: This product worked well for a while, but something attached insude a lid was off and began to leak even when it was closed. I am wondering how weakly this part could be broken.
customer_reviews.author: Jina

customer_reviews.title: If you want to use it without the cover this is not the mug to have.
customer_reviews.text: We have had 2 Thermos coffee mugs for years and they finally gave out. If you had one of the old ones you will remember that they came with a carabiner attached to the handle. Although this one I'm sure keeps liquids very warm for a long time it is not good if you use it without a cover as my husband would do when he was home. The lip of the cup is like drinking out of a metal can if you don't have the cover on. Just disappointed they changed the design and can only be used with the cover on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product and keeps coffee warm all day
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one about 3 years ago. Husband has dropped it several times (Dented and beat up but it still worked until a couple of weeks ago and the lock on the top didn’t seem to click into place. It never leaked). I replaced it with the same one because we were so impressed! He leaves for work at 6 AM and the coffee is still warm when he gets home at 3:30. (Normally it’s gone by 8 because he drinks it but if he is really busy and it’s hot outside he switches to water. That’s how I know it’s still warm at 3:30. LOL)
customer_reviews.author: Shelly B

customer_reviews.title: Hot stays hot!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these and we use them daily. My coffee stays so hot, I have to add a little water to it so I can drink it on my 50 minute commute, otherwise it stays too hot to drink! We also use them when we are working outside and it stays hot, even though we live at 9,800 ft. in the Rockies. It's nice to have hot coffee when it is 20 below 0! I have not had any problems with either of them leaking and we just open the valve on the lid and put the whole thing in the dishwasher. Super easy and convenient. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Raspberry Chips Forever
customer_reviews.text: I bought the black one of these a year ago, hand-washed it daily and ran it thru the dishwasher (top rack, no drying cycle) weekly. It's in perfect shape and I love it. So I bought the raspberry colored one 2 months ago. Same routine: daily hand-washing / weekly top-rack dishwasher. The raspberry paint (a beautiful color!) is now chipping in several places. I don't see a way online to request a replacement. I'm giving 2-stars for the raspberry one that chipped in about 7 weeks of use and 5-stars for the black one which has had no problems in a year of daily use. This averages 4-stars, because I'm a nice person and the cups' functionality is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: D in GA

customer_reviews.title: Best quality and price I have found out in the matketplave
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this thermos , he works outside so it takes a beating , and he cleans it but not as often as I would .This is the second one I have purchased for him only because it was so beaten up and I tried to clean it up which I did , but for the price why not buy a brand new one I think if it had been cleaned thoroughly more often it would have looked better 😁 but I would not hesitate to buy another one and I have bought plenty of tumblerds , thermos, this by far is best quality and price
customer_reviews.author: Chilepepper

customer_reviews.title: A Winner
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made and attractive thermos with a decent price. Keeps coffee piping hot on a lazy Sunday morning and more importantly can be taken to work because it holds the heat very successfully for hours. One of the best gifts I have ever given my husband!
customer_reviews.author: AlwaysSmile

customer_reviews.title: The best Coffee Mug
customer_reviews.text: This is my second mug so that tells you how much I like it. The first one got put in the dishwasher & it took some paint off. So now I have 2( one for outside & the other for inside). The new one has a better slot that doesn't leak if it tips over when closed. Keep my coffee very hot for hours. The only downside is the base. It does fit in car mug holders but is a little tippy on a flat surface.
customer_reviews.author: johnc

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: No ordinary complaints at all. This seems to be quality stuff. Love the handle in particular. Had to return bc I have a disease that effects my ability to swallow and I need a straw to help me. If you can chug, GET THIS ONE!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Works Well, Nightmare to Clean
customer_reviews.text: Keeps coffee hot all morning. Easy to open for drinking. The problem is that the lid has a numerous fully-removable pieces and the removable rubber seals that come off of each of those individual pieces. Thorough cleaning takes a long time since there are so many individual pieces, some of which are very small so it would be possible to lose it down the sink drain if you dropped it. Reassembly can be tricky too since you need to get the rubber seals properly seated again
customer_reviews.author: Steven Schlecht

customer_reviews.title: Top Heavy.
customer_reviews.text: Poor design. This item is sent with no packaging and arrives with scratches and scuff marks, item appears black but ordered a midnight blue mug. Bottom isn't 3 inches but 2 1/4, very narrow since the top is wider than the bottom. With the lid tighten down the mug is in a strange position to try and drink from. This item is designed to tip over. Would not recommend. When I order a new item I expect it to look new, not all scratched and scuffed up.
customer_reviews.author: Mtnman

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product.....Leak proof and holds the temperature/cold for a very long time. I take this to work every day and it does an amazing job keeping my drink warm or cold...Also great for travel...your coffee is hot for a long time and no worry about it going cold.
customer_reviews.author: Garam

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be more pleased. Keeps beverage hot/cold all day. Sturdy metal construction will survive quite a bit of abuse and still function. Easy open/close stays sealed. Can be fully taken apart for cleaning. Standard cup base fits in any car cup holder. Comfortable to drink from with smooth rounded metal lip. This is the only spill proof mug that I actually enjoy drinking from.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B.Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Best mug for the money.
customer_reviews.text: 6 hours and my coffee was still hot. Not straight out of the coffee maker hot, but still drinkable hot. And that was wuthout priming the cup with hot water. For the reviewers complaining about the lid openings not lining up correctly, there are 2 different positions. It they don't line up, unscrew and keep going until the lid pops back down, then screw it on. This mug outperforms the Starbucks mug that my wife bought that costs twice the money. Good thing I left it at one of my cross country stops, or I never would have found this one.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kimball

customer_reviews.title: Great cup, a bit overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Husband likes his new cup. It replaced the same one he had in black that lasted about 5 years before the paint all chipped away and the handle got wiggly. Hoping this one lasts even longer, but the big plus is that there is no paint to chip away! By the way, a search online indicated this is a bit overpriced on amazon but I think it was worth it for the convenience of prime shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Amy R. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Really is leak proof - it's a thermos - come on
customer_reviews.text: Seal it properly, close it properly and it does not leak - very cool. Insulates as well as any thermos product. I really like the red because it is just standout gorgeous. I like the wide open mouth to add ice and stuff, or ingredients for hot drinks. I will get a separate one so I have one for ice stuff and one for hot coffee days.
customer_reviews.author: Dejjjavuu

customer_reviews.title: hot coffee
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband as a replacement for his old Thermos mug which finally wore out after many years of heavy use. This one works extremely well at keeping his coffee hot for several hours. He does not pre-warm the mug as he says the coffee stays hot without it. He is very happy with his new mug. The red color is very deep and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Changela

customer_reviews.title: excellent thermos!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered three of these to replace some aging travel mugs. We've been really happy with a) the fact that they don't leak---at all. If it's leaking, it's likely because the parts were not correctly assembled, b) it keeps the liquids HOT, c) it's easy to clean and put back together (we hand wash to keep the vacuum feature in tact). We've had no problems with the handles or the spout. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jen R.

customer_reviews.title: Hard to unscrew
customer_reviews.text: It’s not my favorite mug. Quality is good but design is bad. The switch to close the lid on top is flimsy. If you are not careful it can leak. I won’t recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: catpaws

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Love these mugs. I have had the one with no handle for years & it works so great for keeping my coffee hot most of the day. I wanted one with the handle for ease of use while driving. Gave my old one to my friend who had used it & fell in love with it. Have never used it for cold but love it for my coffee
customer_reviews.author: Connie B

customer_reviews.title: Quality material/craftsmanship, leak proof, well insulated
customer_reviews.text: I bought the stainless tumbler with the handle. My was shipped with a dent on the bottom but I kept it anyway, as it's quality material. The "THERMOS" wording is a thin plastic strip taped on the mug. Material looks and feels good. Leak proof. Keeps my coffee or tea hot for only around 5 hours before starting to cool, as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Living in SJ, CA

customer_reviews.title: Finally 5th One!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these Thermos Travel Mugs for some time and FINALLY, price was decent. At $19.12 each, I had to buy 2 more as normal price $29 to $36. Perfect as this is my 5th one. One for everyday of the work week. ThanX for a quality product! Owning 5 of these now, do you really need my recommendation?
customer_reviews.author: Father of 2

customer_reviews.title: Unpleasant cold rim
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan at all! A thermos travel mug is to keep coffee (or other beverages) hot while one is travelling, but the first thing one feels when taking every sip from this mug (and, it seems, all other available Thermos insulated mugs) is that cold metal rim, which takes away so much of the pleasure. Their Nissan mug, which is "currently unavailable", had a rubber drinking surface that made drinking coffee or tea so much more enjoyable. The only downside, besides being unavailable, is that it only holds 14 oz. My perfect mug would be the Nissan mug, but with a 20 oz capacity. That one would get a 5 star!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Berry

customer_reviews.title: Handle does not line-up with opening on lid
customer_reviews.text: The handle does not line up with the opening on the lid. You can use "trial and error" to try to get the lid and handle as closely aligned as possible, but it isn't always possible. The handle, therefore, isn't really identical in function to what you would use on a coffee cup or mug. It is helpful, though, in that it is easier to hold the travel mug than it is to hold a tumbler that doesn't have a handle.
customer_reviews.author: AuntB

customer_reviews.title: Hard to Drink From
customer_reviews.text: It's quite difficult to drink hot coffee from this cup. The coffee pours poorly, and can burn the tongue/mouth. Too inconvenient to drink from. The opening and closing mechanism is defective. Customer service remains unresponsive.
customer_reviews.author: MacRay

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: I love this mug. It keeps your coffee hot for a long time, and is truly leakproof. My husband had one while in the navy and he loved it. Great for his deployments.
customer_reviews.author: Michaela Wronkowski

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good but needs one improvement.
customer_reviews.text: This mug definitely keeps my coffee hot for plenty of time. I have a 2.5 hr commute and it’s still plenty warm when I arrive. The main disadvantage it has is the inability to line the opening up correctly so that when holding the cup by the handle, the liquid comes out where you drink. I keep spilling it out the side as I try to sip. It would also be nice to be able to put the lid in the dishwasher rather than hand wash.
customer_reviews.author: Mellie31553

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as old one
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Mug to replace my old one. The old one I had for two years was black and just like most of people had issues with paint pilling off. It was the only reason I had to buy a new one. Otherwise it was the best mug I ever owned. Seems like new one I bought is not the same quality as old one. Time will show...
customer_reviews.author: Ivan

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Drink Hot!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 to keep my and my husband's coffee hot while traveling - one stainless and one black in color. They work extremely well! Very happy with purchase. They replaced cheaper versions that separated outer "skin" from inner lining over time. Very happy with product; they are just as pictured and handle is comfortable. Should have bought sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Janet T.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy the stickers don’t come off and the surface scratches easily
customer_reviews.text: Stupid stickers wouldn’t come off and when I tried to scrub them off with soap and sponge it scratched the outside. It was a pain and in the end I threw mine away the same day I got it. It looked awful with brushed metal look from me trying to get the sticker glue off.
customer_reviews.author: David Scheffler

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Thermos quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a great coffee/tea mug that keeps drinks very hot. The handle is comfortable and the handle design is not easily found on other travel mugs. There is only one drawback to this item and that is the lid seal - it seals almost too well and my wife struggles to get it off at the end of the day (and she works out and is strong). While I would rather have it that way than the opposite, it is a hassle for her.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Keurig sticker on the front of the mug left a mess.
customer_reviews.text: The cranberry color of this travel mug is beautiful, but I found the lid hard to get off. Also, what was most annoying is the yellow sticker that was on the front indicating it will fit in a Keurig. I had a heck of a time getting the sticker off and then the sticky from the sticker got smeared from where the Thermos label is to the bottom of the mug. All that smear left a dull finish on that front part of the mug. I tried baby oil, alcohol, hot soapy water and goo gone and nothing got that sticky off. I used it once. What a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia in WA

customer_reviews.title: It keeps your drinks hot!
customer_reviews.text: This Thermos really delivers. It will keep your drink HOT for at least 3 hours, after that it will still be more than just warm, and it will still be warm after 7 hours. I love it. I love HOT tea or coffee and was very disappointed with Contigo. Thermos delivers, if you like it hot! Cleaning the lid is a bit complicated since it seals so tight, no leaking ever! However, that does not keep me from loving my Thermos.
customer_reviews.author: ipip

customer_reviews.title: Love this mug
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite travel mugs, they keep things hot all day, they don’t leak, they fit in the cup holders, they’re durable (I accidentally ran over one with my car it popped a cover off the handle and slightly bent a lid but still very usable with a little additional character). The only down side is that the lid has to be taken apart to clean thoroughly, but I just take it apart occasionally and throw it in the dishwasher. The most difficult thing is remembering how the seal goes back on which can be a slight hassle, but nothing major.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Best Insulated Mug I have Ever Used
customer_reviews.text: I walk at 4:45 AM and the mug comes with. This was a replacement and has surpassed its predecessor in every way imaginable. Handle makes it easy to carry on long walks. Not heavy. Easy to drink from and closes. It's 1:15 PM and my coffee is still hot. Fits easily in the drink holder in my truck. I'd recommend this product to anyone without reservation.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan L

customer_reviews.title: This is our second mug
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this mug. He had the same one for years and it got so banged up we finally had to replace it with a new one. Keeps coffee hot all day long.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Opie

customer_reviews.title: A+, would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Although it can be a little tricky to get the lid lined up properly, I am very happy with this thermos. It keeps things hot for a long time and it is wonderful. I got it a few months ago and I will be ordering others as gifts for friends, I love it so much I want to share it.
customer_reviews.author: April A.

customer_reviews.title: Newer is not Better!
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased the previous model of this item that was painted and had to replace it because of the paint peeling off. This one is stainless steel and very much an inferior product. It does not keep the coffee hot for anywhere near the length of time of the previous models and now on top of that the top has come apart making the cup useless. Will not purchase a Thermos item again!
customer_reviews.author: Larry Pepper

customer_reviews.title: MAY BE THE LAST ONE I EVER NEED TO BUY
customer_reviews.text: This is MY coffee mug but works for cold beverages too. I had a (free) stainless mug from a conference for several years and liked it, but the cap on it shoved into the top of the mug and started coming apart. This one’s cap screws in and will not pop out if dropped like the free mug/cap. This one is well designed and should last For years! I love this Thermos mug!
customer_reviews.author: HMDDJ.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps drink hot
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one. The first one is 6 years old. The two problems were I wore out the lid, they don’t have replacements. The other problem, hand wash. The dishwasher will peel the paint. The best part, as a teacher, it doesn’t leak when my kids knock it over.
customer_reviews.author: John J. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Sanitary Issues With The Lid
customer_reviews.text: The product does what its supposed to. It kept my coffee hot. When cleaning it however, I have issues with the product. The new design of the lid can't be sanitary. When I took it all apart to clean it, I left it to dry for a day and a half and then went to put it back together and there was still water coming out of it. I always make sure to shake any excess water off before leaving it to dry.
customer_reviews.author: Damon Shively

customer_reviews.title: WORKS AS ADVERTISED!
customer_reviews.text: It's a god sent when it comes to keeping your much needed coffee HOT for up to four hours! and I DO mean HOT the same scolding temp you poured it in! (for best result, pour some boiling water in it for a like 5 seconds to prime it and the pour in the coffee) make sure to keep it closed and then it starts to cool.
customer_reviews.author: Guillermo Semorile

customer_reviews.title: best mug ever found
customer_reviews.text: This has been my coffee cup for years it can keep a drink blistering hot for about 4 hours and warm for 6 its made of metal and lasts basically forever. its totally worth the higher price for quality. i bought this extra one for more coffee to drink as just one mug isnt enough at work. the seal on the cup also is excellent you can put this upside down and not a drop will get through if its sealed properly
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Z.

customer_reviews.title: After way too many coffee cups... I found one I actually use and enjoy!
customer_reviews.text: This tells me when it's closed or open as a glance the lid screws on tight and my coffee is suprizingly warm hours later when I expect it would be cold. Easily fits in my smaller hands. Works in my Honda Civic Cup holder with a lower height clearance. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: ANGELA R.

customer_reviews.title: Thermos Stainless King 16 Ounce Travel Mug with Handle, Cranberry
customer_reviews.text: Got this cup to replace my approximately 10 year old one (same brand and type) that I got locally. The quality of the product is so good I wanted another one just like the first one, that is why I got this one, and if you are wondering, the other one was made in China too. If this one serves me a well as the one it is replacing, I will be getting MORE than my moneys worth.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Lousy lid design
customer_reviews.text: The lid is extremely hard to put on or take off.Most times its not tight enough and the hot item comes out anywhere and can burn you if the liquid is too hot
customer_reviews.author: rick

customer_reviews.title: Love thes cups!!
customer_reviews.text: Great cups for hot liquids. Every guest of our that tries these ends up buying one or several. Biggest complaint is that they can work too well. You may have to wait 30 minutes to keep from burning your tongue. Will keep coffee hot for hours. A drop will easily damage the lid. The body also dents easily. Otherwise, these are the best coffee cups this quality engineer has ever owned!
customer_reviews.author: Richard R.

customer_reviews.title: The Best Mug I've Ever Owned.
customer_reviews.text: This Thermos brand mug is exactly what I wanted. I poured my coffee in at 3:30 this morning. It is now 7:42 and I am still enjoying my hot coffee. No more choking down cold coffee. The cranberry color is very nice and is the color shown in the picture. The lid seals very well with no leaks. The open/close feature in the lid is perfect and works for both right hand and left hand use. The only possible con to this item is the fact that it took a ridiculous amount of time to get the sticker gunk off because I didn't want to use anything that might damage the finish.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Good mug - buy the one without any paint. Paint always chips off after a couple of months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mug in July, 2018. It has worked pretty well keeping the hot tea hot for at least 6 hours. I encountered two problems. 1. The middle insert within the handle fell off. Not sure how it broke. 2. After a year and a half of use, rust has started to show up inside the mug in the bottom. I am buying another similar mug because it is a good product but it is very disappointing that there is rust inside the bug after only 1 1/2 year of use. I hope Thermos read this review and replace it for free.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stainless Steel
customer_reviews.text: This model perhaps has flaws. Each time I receive the "STAINLESS STEEL" I receive ARMY GREEN. This is my wife's present because she uses it in the field for very long days at sea. When I receive this thermos the color of Stainless steel was lacking, presenting a most hideous green hue. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: I'm a real customer

customer_reviews.title: You can never go wrong with a Thermos
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a replacement to another travel mug that was falling apart. Have been trusting Thermos for decades and didn't go wrong here. This mug is sturdy, well made and keeps liquids hot. So hot in fact, my husband has to add an ice cube to his coffee when taking this on his hour long commute to work. The lid is secure and locks closed to be spill-proof. This travel mug was definitely a great choice for us.
customer_reviews.author: Thalia

customer_reviews.title: Great for cofee
customer_reviews.text: My pops loved this for his warm drinks. He usually buys coffee on the go to work but during these times he just brews it at home and drinks it while driving to work. He says it’s lasts him about 3 hours before he can feel the cool down.
customer_reviews.author: Joaquin Silva

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply manufactured  thermos
customer_reviews.text: I love these thermos. It actually works well and exceeded my expectations. I used it for coffee and it keeps it piping hot all day. Update 12/3/2017 Horrible because it is now falling apart. This worked great until now. It didn’t last a year!
customer_reviews.author: R. Kaufman

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the coffee super hot!!
customer_reviews.text: I gifted this to my husband for Father's Day and he said it is the best travel coffee mug he has ever had!
customer_reviews.author: ICraft06

customer_reviews.title: For coffee sippers, not drinkers
customer_reviews.text: I prefer a travel mug for hot drinks with a handle due to hand issues, so I thought this one would do the trick. The two-piece lid comes apart too easily and the opening from which to drink is for sipping - small sips - only, not for drinking. Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: CCWatters

customer_reviews.title: Thermos Brand is the Best
customer_reviews.text: I have one like this I bought over 2-years ago and use it every day. But one day I forgot it at a friends and couldn't pick it up for a day or two. I missed it so bad that I thought I'd better buy another to have ready on stand-by in case I forget it again, or lose it in all my daily travels. The handle works great and for me another big asset to this mug and my coffee. Keeps hot or cold liquids the perfect temperature for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: really good engineering
customer_reviews.text: i mostly use this without the lid, to save wear, but the lid is 100% leakproof in my experience. this mug is so insulated even without the lid, that i've been waiting probably 20 minutes now for my coffee to cool off enough to drink. i'll agree with the comments that say the handle is flimsy, but i followed the advice recommending not to screw open the lid using the handle as leverage, so the handle hasn't broken yet. i've had this mug at least three years by now.
customer_reviews.author: bhmglmo

customer_reviews.title: Keeps liquids very warm but it LEAKS!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this because it does keep liquids very warm for several hours. I’ve used it now for over 10 months for that reason. However, it LEAKS!, even on CLOSED when I accidentally tilt the mug, or tip it on its side. I’ve just had too many accidents with this leaking and am finally giving up. Trying to get some resolution thru 5 year manufacturer’s warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Island Lady

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee cup bad top
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my coffee hot for hours and hours! I’m very happy with this purchase! I really like the color too! I don’t like the top though! There’s too many pieces to take apart to clean and sometimes the lid doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: nuevarosa

customer_reviews.title: hard to drink out of.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my husband and he finds it hard to get the lid aligned properly so that the opening is in the right position to drink out of. I'm returning one that is still in its original wrapping.
customer_reviews.author: Estherswmbo

customer_reviews.title: Keep things hot, otherwise horrible design. Dangerous.
customer_reviews.text: Tough to drink out of. If not closed 'just-so' will leak and/or dribble. Danger of being burned. Bad lid design.
customer_reviews.author: hwolff

customer_reviews.title: Handle is smaller than old style.  Sip opening is not big enough for a straw.
customer_reviews.text: I have used a rolling walker for many years. I found years ago this open handle style Thermos slid perfectly over my walker supports and with the top closed did not leak. My shock is that the newer design is no longer able to slide over my walker frame. And there is now so longer a hole large enough for a straw to be inserted. The old screw-off top was easily handled by even the shakiest of us. I have recommend it to many, many others. But am sad now that we will have to start the hunt again for something that works.
customer_reviews.author: Cincy

customer_reviews.title: Keeps coffee hot for about 4-5 hours...
customer_reviews.text: Keeps coffee hot for about 4-5 hours... good enough for me! Tip: Don't over-tighten the lid. If you feel like you really have to force the lid into the correct position to line up with your mouth when you're holding the handle, then it's too tight. Back it off until it's looser and in the correct position (let the seal do it's job). Can be tricky to reassemble after cleaning... taking some pictures first!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great travel mug
customer_reviews.text: I usually use this for tea, both hot and cold. While on the road, the hot tea stays hot almost all day log. For ice-tea, ice-cubes are still intact the following morning. This is my third Thermos mug. The others got too beat up from constant use.
customer_reviews.author: Declein

customer_reviews.title: Stunning
customer_reviews.text: I am stunned! The travel cup is the buy of a lifetime. I poured at cup at 6:30 a.m., and 12 hours later, my coffee is still warm. Easy to pour, easy to drink from, what more could I ask for? Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: L. Myers

customer_reviews.title: thank
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to the seller a nice product and retains heat for a long time and practical, but there is something worried about me after using it about 10 days the device seemed to lock the vents and open them moving and become light may leak in the future during the closure or may cause evaporation makes it does not retain heat
customer_reviews.author: Mjeed

customer_reviews.title: The best nonspillable travel thermos there is.
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and style of this thermos, though the first one I received had a scratch in the back and I returned it for a fresher one and the second one I received had less of a scratch but not really that bad looking we accepted it as new but I really wish someone would be careful how they treated this cause it clearly is easy to scratch up.
customer_reviews.author: #1 mom

customer_reviews.title: Hot coffee for hours, the handle keeps it secure when I'm working.
customer_reviews.text: It keeps my coffee hot for hours. This is my second one, the last one worked perfectly for years until I lost it. If you put it in the dishwasher the paint will eventually peel off. It will dent if you drop it.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Lasted 9 months for me, in the end the stainless steel rim on the top came loose and would just spin without unscrewing the cap. I also had the an ongoing problem with the cap being more than reasonably hard to unscrew, I was even the only person in the house who could get the top off at all.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Cosmetics trump practicality and it is black, not midnight blue
customer_reviews.text: Beware! If you are right-handed then there are two positions of the screw-on cap that allow you to drink. The "tight' one where the "open" in drinking position becomes "set" after you have filled it with coffee and it is impossible to unscrew with your fingers. You need something to help you with the task since the screw-on top is smooth, frictionless chrome. The position at -360°-from-tight is the one I use but it is fairly loose and doesn't keep the coffee as hot. Why does design trump practicality? Just a few "ribs" on that top would be just right.
customer_reviews.author: DanC

customer_reviews.title: Good quality thermos.
customer_reviews.text: It is a lovely color and keeps my coffee warm for several hours.
customer_reviews.author: Snappy AA

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my coffee warm on long trips
customer_reviews.text: It works well, and I admit I trust the Thermos brand in these things. As another reviewer noted, it takes an extra effort to make the lid turn that last quarter of a turn to line up the 'open' position correctly. This isn't a defect. The extra effort makes sure you have a good seal.
customer_reviews.author: David K. vun Kannon

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Care for this one
customer_reviews.text: I didn't care for this one. It is hard to drink hot liquids from and the lid leaks. I've put this back on the shelf and use my other mugs first
customer_reviews.author: HaveDogsLuv2Hike

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his new coffee mug. It fits all his requirements. Keeps his coffee hot, easy to use, cleans well, good design, and it fits perfectly in his car mug holder. Just right!!
customer_reviews.author: scotlass3

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This mug is almost too good, the first time i used it I couldn’t drink my coffee for at least 40 minutes. It was too hot. Since then I’ve learned to pour 12oz of coffee and then add 4oz of cool water. Works wonderfully for a 30-40 minute meeting.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love these thermos coffee mugs
customer_reviews.text: Love these thermos coffee mugs. My Dad loves the handle. It helps gripping and no slipping. He likes to hook it to his pants (LOL, I know it is silly). I am a frequent buyer as my Dad has dementia and leaves them in the taxi or at the "Center" he attends. (I think they like them too, because we never get them back, and I have a sticker with name/address & p#). Coffee stays warm and the design is awesome. :) :) :)
customer_reviews.author: Michelle R.

customer_reviews.title: Hot stays Hot
customer_reviews.text: This thermos does exactly what it's supposed to do. It keeps a hot beverage hot and has an uncompromising handle so you don't lose your grip. It might even second as a hand-warmer, if you're brave enough! It can be a little tricky to clean thoroughly, but the lid and valve comes apart easily enough into three pieces for those deep cleans.
customer_reviews.author: Sivade

customer_reviews.title: Nice Open Handle Design
customer_reviews.text: I love my mug. I like the open handle design because I can hang the handle from my jeans pocket and be hands free doing what ever. It rides nicely in the shopping carts by hanging the handle over the child seat and it doesn't get scratched up by putting it in the shopping cart cup holders. It keeps my coffee hot for several hours. Great cup.
customer_reviews.author: joeglo

customer_reviews.title: Keeps, Beverages Hot
customer_reviews.text: Just,used this travel mug yesterday.Looks good and seems well made.I use it when going to dialysis.I sit in the chair for 3.5 hours.The coffee remained hot most of the time (3 hours).When,I finally drank the last sip,it was still very warm. I,am so glad I made this purchase.I'll defiantly be buying one of these travel mugs,again.Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Jermaine Young

customer_reviews.title: Awesome travel mug , No Spills an stays Hot forever but Hard to open even when top is set to "open"....hope you have strong grip
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom.Great mug. Amazing how warm it keeps the liquid especially with extremely cold ambient temps going on here in the North East and it doesn't spill. One complaint is it is very hard to open even with the position set to "open". The sliver lip part is so smooth and the seal is so tight that I (late 20's male) have a tough time opening it for my mom which kind of defeats the purpose of giving to someone with weak hands. Just something to think about. Maybe a thumb tab to get some leverage against would help. Other than that good job Thermos.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Undecided how I feel about the mug
customer_reviews.text: This thermos is a lot smaller than I expected. I’m not sure if I’ll be keeping it. Disappointed by the size. Was hoping to have a large cup of coffee to go. Not a small cup. Seems well made the lid does not fully prevent spills but seems okay.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Short-lived & complicated
customer_reviews.text: This mug was wonderful - for about 2 weeks. It does everything it says. Coffee was hot enough to burn after 4 hours! Great--BUT--the sealing mechanism has 5 pieces, including 2 gaskets, that must be taken apart after every use! The gaskets were hard to clean. Even after daily soaking and careful scrubbing, I could still smell my coffee creamer. You knew that mold wasn't far away. It was just too much work...and then the threads on the tiny screw plastic part that operated the open/close mechanism stripped. After that, it wouldn't completely close or open. The mug just has too many plastic pieces that don't last. Thermos should be able to come up with something simpler.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mug, worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent mug, keeps my coffee hot all day. Even when camping in near freezing temperatures a hot cup filled up before bed will still be hot, not super hot, but good to drink by morning. Be careful of the handle though if knocked around to much the handle may loosen even a little bit and break the vacuum. still pretty durable lasted nearly a year or more of daily use and abuse carrying around hanging on my belt and being thrown around a truck. No leaks as long as you remember to close the sipping hole.
customer_reviews.author: Wmcgi

customer_reviews.title: Best Coffee Mug
customer_reviews.text: Awesome mug...i use it every morning and since i get busy at work, it could take 3hrs before i finish my coffee...it is ALWAYS hot. Hoghly recommend. May even get another one
customer_reviews.author: Steve L

customer_reviews.title: watch how you do it
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my coffee hot for at least five hours. If you take the lid apart to wash, watch how you do it. I had a hard time putting it back together. Update: Good while it lasted so I knocked only one star off. Otherwise I would give it only two stars if this happened right away. The shiny metal ring you see on the top now spins and you can't unscrew the top. If I could get it off then I would be afraid to tighten it good enough to seal it so it doesn't drip down my shirt. I tossed it in the trash instead of contacting the maker. It's not worth my time messing with that.
customer_reviews.author: Bill R

customer_reviews.title: The caddy of thermos, stay up with maint.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mug. Coffee stays hot. There are some moving parts to this mug tho...the top is comprised of several pieces that should be taken apart and cleaned frequently to prevent mold. If yer okay with that good, if not, choose a less maintenance thermos.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Good to the last drop!
customer_reviews.text: I lost my first one, so bought a second. The only recommendation I have is they install a built-in GPS for dummies like me! Coffee stays hot all morning. Who could ask for more?
customer_reviews.author: ProgrockVT

customer_reviews.title: The top is hard to remove after 5th use
customer_reviews.text: The top is very hard to unscrew, the rubber ring slips
customer_reviews.author: CeCe V

customer_reviews.title: Great Travel Mug
customer_reviews.text: This is the ONLY travel mug my hubster will use. Handle, stainless interior, great colors. We lovingly refer to this as his ba-ba. We never leave home without it. I also recently purchased one for my boss for Christmas, with a variety of teas I knew she liked. She LOVES it! I most certainly will by this again, and highly recommend it for personal use or as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mug
customer_reviews.text: We've owned several of these mugs and love them. They are very sturdy, keep the liquid hot for hours and last a long time. We put the lid in the dishwasher but wash the cup by hand.
customer_reviews.author: Chere M.

customer_reviews.title: Effective but tedious to clean
customer_reviews.text: If you’re looking for something that keeps coffee warm for hours and prevents spills and leaks, this is the mug for you. If you’re look for something that’s easy to clean, I would you advise to keep looking. The leakproof cap has a 5 separate parts that need to be washed after each use, then put back together. The silicon gaskets stain pretty easily from coffee too. Despite the tedious cleaning and assembling, the mug does keep the coffee or tea warm for hours and is virtually leakproof.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L.

customer_reviews.title: Angled Handle - Otherwise Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great travel mug. Only one minor complaint the handle is angled. If it were straight it would fit into my car cup holder better. It fits but not as well as it could. Even with that, this is a great mug and it fits my need.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Best ever! Does not leak and keeps my coffee hot for hours!! I usually make latte at 6:30 and take it to work which i end up drinking around 10:30am and it’s still nicely hot!! I throw it in the dishwasher every night and cleaning is done! Only thing is that the part I sip out of has some red lipstick residue that doesn’t come off but no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: N.J.O.

product_meta.title: Thermos Stainless King 16 Ounce Travel Mug, Stainless Steel
product_meta.description: Color:Stainless SteelAn ideal choice for people on the go, the THERMOS Stainless King Vacuum Insulated Travel Mug is built to last and loaded with features to make for a more enjoyable drinking experience. THERMOS vacuum insulation technology virtually eliminates temperature change within the beverage container by creating an airless space between two stainless steel walls. The result is a superior insulated container you can depend on to keep your beverages hotter, colder, fresher, longer. This travel mug keeps beverages hot for 5 hours or cold for 9, making it a great choice for long days out and about or in the office. Constructed with double wall stainless steel, this 16 ounce travel mug is virtually durable, yet its sleek design is both eye-catching and functional. The contoured body shape is easy to grip and fits most automobile cup holders and is single serve compatible. For tea drinkers, a built-in tea hook is just the ticket to brew tea on the go. The tea hook can also accommodate most loose leaf infusers. The Stainless King Travel Mug comes equipped with a lid which operates simply by pushing the lever 45 degrees right or left to open and close. Because of the double wall insulation, the stainless steel body stays cool to the touch with hot beverages and condensation-free with cold beverages. In order to maximize the incredible insulation technology, it is recommended to either pre-chill or pre-heat the travel mug just prior to use. This can be accomplished by filling the mug with cold or hot tap water, attaching the lid and letting it rest for a few minutes. Before you are ready to use, simply empty the water and fill with your favorite beverage. The Stainless King Vacuum Insulated Travel Mug is made of BPA-free materials and is backed by a five-year limited warranty.
feature_bullets: THERMOS vacuum insulation technology for maximum temperature retention, hot or cold; keeps liquids hot for 5 hours and cold for 9 hours
Durable stainless steel interior and exterior
Cool to the touch with hot liquids, sweat-proof with cold
Built-in tea hook easily holds tea bags or most loose leaf infusers
Fits most automobile cup holders; single serve compatible

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars5,139 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
